ygData.subject: Re: I will no longer post updates to this list.  (txt)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not?  It s a blacksmithing page and a blacksmithing list?  Riiiight, go back to alt.2600 and post articles about your Atari. ... *snip*
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:41 5/5/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: patrick.r.baxter@...
>
>Didn't mean to sink your boat... there are several forums that your web page
>would be quite welcome in. This just doesn't happen to be one made for that
>sort of thing. Go back to Onelist and fine the general forum and post there,
>I am sure you will get a better responce from that crowd.

It's not? It s a blacksmithing page and a blacksmithing list? Riiiight,
go back to alt.2600 and post articles about your Atari.

>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Charles Adams [mailto:sirkal@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:53 AM
>To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] I will no longer post updates to this list.
>(txt)
>
>
>From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
>
>I'd like to start off by thanking Reedo, Chet, and David for their kind
>words.
>
>Unfortunately far more people seem to think I am some kind of loser for
>trying tell you all that my site is out there. I was under the impression
>that this mailing list was to keep people informed about EverQuest, and
>particularly about Smithing.
>
*snip*
>
>Visit My EverQuest Page; including zone maps, trade skill guides, general
>weapons info, and more:
>http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/EverQuest.htm
>
